!Evain:
Did you forget your mission? It`s to defeat the Husk Crawlers in the Military Compound!
First you must take the key I gave you to *Holden* at the *Military Compound Entrance*. Tell him you`ve come to defeat the Husk Crawlers, and he`ll let you in.
If you lose key, come back to me. Once you`ve defeated all the Husk Crawlers, report to *Shannon* at the *Training Grounds*.
